about: World Aviation Flight Academy, founded in 2014, is an AESA-certified and EASA-recognized flight school specializing in comprehensive training for helicopter, airplane, and professional drone operators. With two learning centers in Cuatro Vientos, Madrid, and Malaga-Costa del Sol International Airport, the academy offers high-quality training, seeking academic excellence and a transparent approach. Our instructors, with over 25 years of experience, provide training in various fields including commercial flights, search & rescue, fire-fighting, and aerial work. The academy's fleet is specifically designed for pilot training, ensuring ample flight time and ideal flying conditions year-round. We focus on student-centered training, adapting to individual needs and providing modular and integrated courses, including ATPL Frozen programs and MCC training. Our commitment to safety, efficiency, and student support ensures that every graduate is well-prepared for a successful aviation career.
